item.title: How sea otters can fight climate change
item.description: Sea otters were hunted to the brink in the 19th Century fur trade, but their numbers have been slowly recovering since. The return of these playful creatures doesn’t just transform their ecosystems, it can turn them into a powerful carbon sink.
